title: Sewing Needle
description:
A threaded silver needle. Color of thread varies from platform to platform.

Can be used to talk about crafts including embroidery, quilting, or sewing in general. Can also be used in medical contexts to talk about stitches.

Used metaphorically at the beginning of a thread, or series of connected posts by one person, on social media.

Realistic lighting and 3D shading on Apple devices highlight its fine point and the smooth curve of the thread passing through its eye, creating a sense of delicate craftsmanship. This emoji, representing sewing, mending, or creation, brings an artisan touch and a feeling of precision to messages on Apple devices.
